title: Monitoring - Low Disk Space Alert
description: An RMM alert indicates that a server's C: drive has less than 10% free space.

tasks.description: Run a script via the RMM tool to identify the largest files and folders on the drive.
tasks.expected_outcome: The script reveals that old application log files are taking up most of the space.

tasks.description: Run another script to safely delete log files older than 90 days, freeing up space and resolving the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Disk space is reclaimed, and the alert clears.
